framework_info.framework_name: NIST SP 800-53 Security and Privacy Controls
framework_info.framework_description: NIST Special Publication 800-53 provides a catalog of security and privacy controls for federal information systems and organizations to protect organizational operations and assets, individuals, other organizations, and the Nation from a diverse set of threats including hostile attacks, human errors, natural disasters, structural failures, foreign intelligence entities, and privacy risks.

policies.policy_title: SA-15(13) Development Process, Standards, and Tools
policies.scope: New Control/Control Enhancement and Assessment Procedure
policies.objective: The primary objective of this policy is to establish clear requirements and guidelines for sa-15(13) development process, standards, and tools, ensuring organizational compliance and operational effectiveness. Specific objectives include: (1) establishing clear expectations and requirements for organizational behavior; (2) ensuring consistent implementation of best practices across all applicable areas; (3) minimizing operational risks and compliance gaps; (4) promoting accountability and responsibility among all stakeholders; (5) enabling effective monitoring and continuous improvement; and (6) supporting overall organizational objectives and strategic goals.

compliance_records.ComplianceItemDescription: Conducting a root cause analysis to identify and remediate flaws in the system or process.
compliance_records.PolicyTitle: SA-15(13) Development Process, Standards, and Tools

policies.scope: New in final based on stakeholder feedback. Added to address cyber resiliency by design.

compliance_records.ComplianceItemDescription: All employees must be trained on the proper handling and storage of sensitive information.
Regular backups must be performed daily, and data must be recovered within 24 hours in case of a disaster.
All employees must undergo background checks before starting work.

compliance_records.ComplianceItemDescription: The organization must implement and maintain a data backup system to ensure business continuity in case of a disaster.
